items.question: How does learning on the platform work?
items.answer: Learning is conducted online. Students get access to video materials, assignments, and tests. Each course has its own mentor who supports students throughout the process.

items.question: Are there any trial lessons?
items.answer: Yes, we offer several free trial lessons so you can evaluate the course quality and structure before making a purchase.

items.question: How do I get a certificate?
items.answer: After successfully completing the course and all assignments, you will receive a certificate confirming your skills.

items.question: Can I get a refund if I don't like the course?
items.answer: Yes, you can request a refund within 14 days of purchase if the course doesnâ€™t meet your expectations.
